name: Soullife
description:
The last thing you remembered was falling asleep in your warm and cozy bed…

Now your soul has been separated from your body and placed into a ghost-infested alternate realm. Your only defense is a limited supply of holy water.

See how long you can stay alive in this spooky arcade-style survival game.

Made for Ludum Dare 46 (theme: keep your _____ alive). All code, graphics, and audio made over the span of 2 days.
